name: Astro Rider
description:
Pc game for Windows.

A classic shooter (horizontal scroll) created in pixel art, with a great nostalgic feeling.

Gala is a space rider and she's got an only mission: Save the world from the robot invasion.

In this nice game (with a fantastic retrogame taste) you'll have power ups that will increase your power, you'll have the ability to enchance your level (and upgrade your spacebike in 3 different models) playing in more than 25 stages. You'll be good enough to reach the final boss and defeat him?
